text: INDEX LOCKING [f there is a dense index on the status field then the txn can lock index page containing the data with status="1lit". [f there are no records with status='lit',the txn must lock the index page where such a data entry would be, if it existed. | 2 A E E â€” 86e 80n CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
